name: Poly Wavetable
description: This algorithm is a complete polyphonic synthesizer using wavetable oscillators. Each voice has two envelopes, a filter and an LFO. It is inspired by the original Poly Wavetable algorithm on the disting EX. The display shows notes being played with superimposed envelope bars for each voice, along with the waveform of the most recently played note's wavetable.
gui_description: The display shows notes being played by the various voices, each superimposed on a bar to indicate the note envelope. The waveform within the wavetable of the most recently played note is also shown.

output_ports.name: Left output
output_ports.description: The left output bus for audio signal routing.

output_ports.name: Right output
output_ports.description: The right output bus for audio signal routing.
